name: Security Room
description:
Protect the warehouse from thieves using your skills and best Security equipment.

This inovative game is Third-Person simulation of Security man who had security company.First contract is "Small warehouse" and goal is to bring security level to the maximum,then other contracts will be unlock (still in development). Game simulate logic of roberry and protection against. There are 4 gates for thieves,Each gate (door) can be controlled by alarm and way to storage controlled by Cameras. Each Thief had own inteligence and strategy for his roberry step by step you need to learn it so you will always know what they will try to do. By First contract for each thief you catch it,you will be rewarded with 50$ but as well you will losse 50$ if thief escape you.

This is Early-Acess stage and your feedback will be more then Helpful,as well such I am still doing this alone,every DONATION is MORE THEN HELPFUL in order to continue working on this game.

Are you Developer/Atist? Love this game? you are welcome to join in my team.
